titles.title: To amend the General Educations Provisions Act expanding the exemption for the release of student records to comply with certain State statutes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities. for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: 7/18/1995--Introduced. Amends the General Education Provisions Act to revise the exemption from specified family educational and privacy rights for the release of student records to comply with certain State statutes.
